# IBrowserCache.GenerateDownloadLinkAsync method

Creates an anchor tag to download the database and injects it into the parent.
```csharp
public Task<bool> GenerateDownloadLinkAsync(ElementReference parent, string filename)
```
| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| parent | The host for the tag. |
| filename | The database filename. |
## Return Value
A value indicating whether the operation was successful.
